ReturnsExchanges.title: Returns & Exchanges Policy
ReturnsExchanges.subtitle: We want you to be completely satisfied with your purchase. Please review our policy below.

returnPolicy.title: Return Policy
returnPolicy.intro: We accept returns within 14 days of delivery for most products. Items must be in their original condition with all packaging and accessories.
returnPolicy.eligible1: Product is in original, unused condition
returnPolicy.eligible2: All original packaging, accessories, and documentation included
returnPolicy.eligible3: Return initiated within 14 days of delivery
returnPolicy.eligible4: Product has not been damaged or modified
returnPolicy.nonEligible1: Software products that have been opened or activated
returnPolicy.nonEligible3: Products damaged due to misuse or improper installation

exchangePolicy.title: Exchange Policy
exchangePolicy.intro: We offer exchanges for defective products or if you received the wrong item. Exchanges are subject to product availability.
exchangePolicy.step1: Contact our customer service within 14 days of delivery
exchangePolicy.step2: Provide your order number and reason for exchange
exchangePolicy.step3: Ship the item back in its original packaging
exchangePolicy.step4: Receive your replacement item once we process your exchange

timeline.title: Processing Timeline
timeline.returnWindowDesc: You have 14 days from delivery to initiate a return or exchange
timeline.processingDesc: Returns are inspected and processed within 3-5 business days
timeline.refundDesc: Refunds are issued to your original payment method within 7-10 business days

contact.title: Need Help?
contact.description: If you have any questions about returns or exchanges, please contact our customer service team or view your order history.

TermsConditions.title: Terms & Conditions
TermsConditions.subtitle: Please read these terms and conditions carefully before using our services.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content1: By accessing and using this website, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.
acceptance.content2: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Your continued use of the website following any changes constitutes acceptance of those changes.

useOfServices.title: Use of Services
useOfServices.intro: When you create an account with us, you must provide accurate, complete, and current information. Failure to do so constitutes a breach of the Terms.
useOfServices.rule1: Use the service for any illegal purpose or to violate any laws
useOfServices.rule2: Attempt to gain unauthorized access to any portion of the website
useOfServices.rule3: Interfere with or disrupt the service or servers
useOfServices.rule4: Impersonate any person or entity or misrepresent your affiliation

products.title: Products and Orders
products.content1: All product descriptions, images, and pricing are subject to change without notice. We reserve the right to limit quantities and discontinue products.
products.content2: We make every effort to display product colors and images as accurately as possible. However, we cannot guarantee that your device's display will accurately reflect the actual product color.
products.content3: Prices are subject to change without notice. We reserve the right to refuse or cancel any order for any reason.

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.content1: The service and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by Al-Nojoom Al-Rakia and are protected by international copyright, trademark, patent, trade secret, and other intellectual property laws.
intellectual.content2: You may not reproduce, distribute, modify, create derivative works of, publicly display, or exploit any of our content without our express written permission.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: In no event shall Al-Nojoom Al-Rakia, nor its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, or affiliates, be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses.

contact.title: Questions About Terms?
contact.description: If you have any questions about these Terms and Conditions, please contact our customer service team.

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.subtitle: Your privacy is important to us. This policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your information.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.intro: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including:
collection.type1: Personal information (name, email address, phone number)
collection.type3: Payment information (processed securely through our payment providers)

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.intro: We use the information we collect to:
usage.purpose2: Communicate with you about your orders and account
usage.purpose3: Send you marketing communications (with your consent)
usage.purpose5: Detect and prevent fraud and abuse

protection.title: Data Protection
protection.content1: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized or unlawful processing, accidental loss, destruction, or damage.
protection.content2: We use industry-standard SSL encryption to protect sensitive information transmitted online. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.right1: Access the personal information we hold about you
rights.right3: Request deletion of your personal information
rights.right4: Object to processing of your personal information

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our website and store certain information. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent.

contact.title: Privacy Questions?
contact.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact our customer service team.

AboutUs.title: About Us
AboutUs.subtitle: Leading provider of computer hardware and networking solutions in Saudi Arabia

overview.title: Company Overview
overview.content1: Nojoom Al Raqia for Trading Co. is a leading provider of computer hardware, accessories, cabinets, and networking solutions in Saudi Arabia. Established with a vision to deliver excellence in technology solutions, we have been serving businesses and individuals with premium quality products.
overview.content2: Located in the heart of Riyadh at Olaya - Al-khaleej Computer Group, we pride ourselves on offering a comprehensive range of products from the world's leading manufacturers. Our commitment to quality and customer satisfaction has made us a trusted name in the industry.
overview.content3: With years of experience in the technology sector, we understand the evolving needs of our customers and continuously update our product portfolio to include the latest innovations in computer hardware and networking equipment.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To provide high-quality computer hardware and networking solutions that empower businesses and individuals to achieve their technological goals, while maintaining the highest standards of customer service and support.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To be the most trusted and preferred destination for computer hardware and networking solutions in Saudi Arabia, recognized for our product quality, expertise, and exceptional customer experience.

values.title: Our Values
values.value1Desc: We source only genuine products from authorized distributors and manufacturers, ensuring the highest quality standards.
values.value2Desc: Our customers are at the heart of everything we do. We strive to exceed expectations with every interaction.
values.value3Desc: We conduct business with honesty, transparency, and ethical practices in all our dealings.

whyUs.title: Why Choose Us
whyUs.reason1: Extensive product range from leading global manufacturers
whyUs.reason2: Competitive pricing and flexible payment options
whyUs.reason4: Fast and reliable delivery across Saudi Arabia

contact.title: Ready to Get Started?
contact.description: Explore our extensive range of products and discover how we can help you with your technology needs.

WarrantyMaintenance.title: Warranty & Maintenance
WarrantyMaintenance.subtitle: Comprehensive warranty coverage and maintenance services for your peace of mind.

warranty.title: Warranty Coverage
warranty.intro: We stand behind the quality of our products. All items purchased from Al-Nojoom Al-Rakia come with warranty protection.
warranty.covered1: Manufacturing defects in materials and workmanship
warranty.covered2: Hardware failures under normal use conditions
warranty.covered3: Component malfunctions not caused by user error
warranty.covered4: Performance issues related to product specifications
warranty.notCovered1: Damage from accidents, misuse, or improper installation
warranty.notCovered2: Normal wear and tear or cosmetic damage
warranty.notCovered3: Damage from unauthorized repairs or modifications

period.title: Warranty Periods
period.standardDesc: Most products include a 1-year manufacturer warranty from the date of purchase.
period.extendedDesc: Premium products may include extended warranty coverage up to 3 years.
period.manufacturerDesc: Some products carry specific manufacturer warranty terms. Please check product details.

maintenance.title: Maintenance Services
maintenance.intro: We offer comprehensive maintenance services to keep your equipment running at peak performance.
maintenance.service1: Regular system diagnostics and health checks

claim.title: How to Claim Warranty
claim.step1: Contact our customer service with your order number and product details
claim.step2: Describe the issue and provide any relevant photos or documentation
claim.step3: Our technical team will assess the claim and provide instructions
claim.step4: Ship the product to our service center (if required)
claim.step5: Receive your repaired or replaced product within the specified timeframe

contact.title: Need Warranty Support?
contact.description: Our warranty and maintenance team is here to help. Contact us for any warranty claims or maintenance inquiries.
